name: Bubble Hell
description:
Little multiplayer game made in 48h according to the theme "backfire".
The game is in french but it should be understandable by everyone.

The aim is to shoot at others players and kill them, but beware, your bullets will be trapped in bubbles !

You will need at least two game controllers to play this game ! (Up to four).

CONTROLS :
- Left pad : Control your character.
- A : Dash
- X : Shoot
- Y : Pop your bubble
- Right Pad : Move your bubble

Have Fun !

Game created by :
- Antoine Jégo
- Jérémy Briant
- Léa Hammoud
- Yohan Chenebault
- Yann David
- Rémi Monthiller
